H0.text: Queen Joan Of Navarre was the wife of which English king . Edward III

H1.text: Queen Joan Of Navarre was the wife of which English king . Richard II

H2.text: Queen Joan Of Navarre was the wife of which English king . John

H3.text: Queen Joan Of Navarre was the wife of which English king . Henry 4

A4.text: On 7 February 1403, nine years after the death of his first wife, Henry married Joan, the daughter of Charles II of Navarre, at Winchester.
